data.description_html:
Your weapon bursts into flames as you twirl it over your head. With a flourish, you cause the fire to explode with a blinding flash.

When you use this strike, you generate a burst of brilliant light. Any creature other than you caught in this maneuver?s area must make a Fortitude save (DC 11 + your Wis modifier) or be dazzled for 1 minute. This maneuver is a supernatural ability.
data.name: Blistering Flourish
